thread.title: VIDEO: Lewandowski freestyling and taking his shirt off
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Lewandowski freestyling and taking his shirt off

title: VIDEO: Lewandowski freestyling and taking his shirt off
text:
0 30-Jan-2017 15:48:44 The Poland star showed off his exquisite skills in Bayern Munich training with an extremely difficult freestyle trick 
Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski is best known for putting the ball in the net, but has regularly shown he is excellent at tricks and skills too. 
In Bayern's latest training video, the Poland international highlights his freestyle skills by not only doing a neck stall, but going one step further and taking off his shirt with the ball still in position. 
If that wasn't enough, Lewandowski even attempts to put the shirt back on again afterwards! 
Check it all out in the video below 
Lewandowski is Bayern's top scorer this season with 14 goals in 18 Bundesliga appearances. Related
